en.title: Amend your application
en.ifYouWantYour: If you want your divorce to continue, you need to resubmit the application using a different reason (fact) for divorce.
en.amendmentFee: You’ll also have to pay an amendment fee of £95.
en.notAbleToRead: You won’t be able to read your {{ case.divorceWho }}’s response after you started amending your application. Go back a screen if you want to read it again.
